name: Espresso
description: Espresso is a strong and concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Americano
description: Americano is a smooth coffee made by adding hot water to a shot of espresso.

name: Iced Latte
description: Iced Latte is a refreshing coffee drink made with espresso, milk, and ice.

name: Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a classic Italian coffee topped with steamed milk foam.

name: Mocha
description: Mocha is a rich coffee drink combining espresso, chocolate, and milk.

name: Iced Americano
description: Iced Americano is a bold espresso-based coffee served over ice.

name: Cold Brew
description: Cold Brew is coffee brewed slowly with cold water for a smooth and less acidic taste.

name: Caramel Latte
description: Caramel Latte is a sweet coffee made with espresso, milk, and caramel syrup.
